      • getAllCucumberMethods

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Method> getAllCucumberMethods(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Gets all Cucumber methods.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class which is the main point of the application (Decorated with the annotation cucumber.api.CucumberOptions)
        Returns:
        a Map of all Cucumber glue code methods of the application. First part of the entry is the Gherkin matching regular expression. Second part is the corresponding invokable method.
